name: Bitten By Darkness
description:
You have been bitten by the Darkness that invades the lands. Your goal is to save as many people as possible before you succumb to the Darkness.

If needed, you can Sacrifice some of your time to combine 3 Dark Remnants to gain a random buff.

CONTROLS:

LEFT: "A", RIGHT: "D"

JUMP: "Space", SAVE: "E"

SACRIFICE: "C "
